summary: A woman from Beijing, pregnant with the child of her rich married boyfriend flies to Seattle in order to deliver the baby. There she meets another Chinese immigrant man working as a driver, even as she finds her life beginning to change.
cast: Tang Wei|Xiubo Wu|Hai-Qing|Hongmei Mai|Elaine Jin|Yiwei Liu|Wang Qian|Li Qi Hong|Jessica Song|Monica Song|Rene Wang|Tom Jones|Sotos Petrides|Yee Tong|Brad Harder|Fiona Fu|Junxi Hu|Casey Manderson|Jason Benson|Tai Yan Wu|Wang Hong Sheng|Aidan Parker|Christina Guo|Jason Burkart|Gloria Tan|Julius Fair|Dante Lee Arias|Emery Mintoft-Graystone|Trevor Bess|Alex Dafoe|Peter Jenkins|Derek Green|Katherine Ramdeen|Michael Patrick Denis|Yanlai Li|Stacey Stewart|Clayton James|Victoria Waterhouse|Huei Ling Yang|Danielle Kremeniuk|Jordan Cooper|Virgil Davies|Patricia Hernandez|Edgardo Parinas|Alexis Kuerbig|Anna Rukavina|Benjamin Seth Ray|Carolyn Adair
title: Bei Jing yu shang Xi Ya Tu
